name: Skills
description: The Skills module provides functions for managing player skills and experience points. It supports various skill systems with a unified interface.

clientFunctions.name: GetResourceName
clientFunctions.description: Gets the name of the currently active skills system.

returns.description: Name of the skills system being used

clientFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

local skillsSystem = Bridge.Skills.GetResourceName()
print("Using skills system: " .. skillsSystem)

clientFunctions.name: GetSkillLevel
clientFunctions.description: Gets the current level of a specific skill for the player.

parameters.name: skillName
parameters.description: Name of the skill to check

returns.description: Current level of the skill (0 if not supported)

clientFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

local drivingLevel = Bridge.Skills.GetSkillLevel("driving")
local shootingLevel = Bridge.Skills.GetSkillLevel("shooting")

print("Driving level: " .. drivingLevel)
print("Shooting level: " .. shootingLevel)

serverFunctions.name: AddXp
serverFunctions.description: Adds experience points to a specific skill for a player.

parameters.name: skillName
parameters.description: Name of the skill to add XP to

returns.description: True if XP was added successfully, false if not supported

serverFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

-- Add driving XP when player completes a delivery
local success = Bridge.Skills.AddXp(source, "driving", 25)
if success then
    Bridge.Notify.SendNotify(source, "You gained 25 driving XP!", "success")
end

serverFunctions.name: RemoveXp
serverFunctions.description: Removes experience points from a specific skill for a player.

parameters.name: skillName
parameters.description: Name of the skill to remove XP from

returns.description: True if XP was removed successfully, false if not supported

serverFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

-- Remove driving XP as penalty for reckless driving
local success = Bridge.Skills.RemoveXp(source, "driving", 10)
if success then
    Bridge.Notify.SendNotify(source, "You lost 10 driving XP for reckless driving!", "error")
end
